    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Razpoznaj polarizacijo</string>
            <string language="en">Identify polarization</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennzeichnen Sie Polarisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Identifiez la polarisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Identifique o polarization</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Identifichi la polarizzazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσδιορίστε την πόλωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Identifique la polarización</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Seštevanje dveh med seboj pravokotnih električnih polj z različno amplitudo in fazo.</string>
            <string language="en">Superposition of two perpendicular electrical fields of equal amplitude and phase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">krožna polarizacija</string>
            <string language="en">circular polarization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">polarizacija</string>
            <string language="en">polarization</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Superposition von zwei senkrechtelektrischen 
fängt vom gleichen Umfang und von der Phase auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Superposition de deux champs électriques 
perpendiculaires d'amplitude et de phase égales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Superposition de dois campos elétricos 
perpendiculares da amplitude e da fase iguais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un superposition di due campi elettrici 
perpendicolari di ampiezza e della fase uguali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Superposition δύο κάθετων ηλεκτρικών πεδίων του 
ίσων εύρους και της φάσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Superposición de dos campos eléctricos 
perpendiculares de amplitud y de fase iguales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmige Polarisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polarisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">polarisation circulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">polarisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
